forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 50. West southwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun lingers low in the sky, Downtown San Francisco finds itself draped in a gentle haze that softens the edges of the iconic skyline. This afternoon basks in bright sunlight, though the warmth feels tempered, resting comfortably around sixty-two degrees before gradually yielding to a cooler embrace as the hours pass. A light breeze wafts in from the west-southwest, infusing the atmosphere with a refreshing touch that may stir the leaves but doesn’t disrupt the serenity of the day. 

Tonight, the veil of cloud cover will deepen, wrapping the city in a cozy twilight, with temperatures dipping to a low of fifty. The marine layer, ever vigilant, forecasts a slight whisper of fog rolling in, especially as the shadows lengthen. For those stepping out, a light jacket or sweater will afford that extra comfort as the evening cools. With the soothing weather beckoning, consider strolling through one of the neighborhood parks, perhaps lingering on a bench to watch as the sky evolves from blue to shimmering shades of dusk, punctuated by the city's soft lights coming alive. A quiet walk along the waterfront could also prove refreshing, where the waters offer their own symphony amidst the backdrop of maritime whispers.
